meanings.sent1: The artist used various hues to paint the beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent2: The rainbow displayed a spectrum of vibrant hues in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child mixed all the hues together and created a messy masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were reflected in the changing hues of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a riot of hues, with flowers of every color imaginable.

meanings.definition: To color or tint with a certain shade
meanings.sent1: She carefully hues the walls of her room with a soft pink paint.
meanings.sent2: The artist hues the canvas with bold strokes of blue and green.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally hues his hair purple instead of black, much to his surprise.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun hues the clouds with a warm orange glow.
meanings.sent5: The dye slowly hues the fabric a deep, rich red color.
